## FormatNumberOptions.suffixStart property

How large the number has to be before it will collapse into a suffixed form. If not provided, defaults to 1000. This is ignored for ram and percent. Ram always shows a suffix and percent never shows a suffix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
suffixStart?: number;
```
